name: WEDDINGS AT KESWICK
description:
The property offers over 4,000 square feet of indoor function space as well as a gorgeous outdoor setting for up to 500.  Custom designed tents can be erected over the Great Lawn and the Oval Lawn, a natural setting that is perfect for ceremonies.

The Keswick Ballroom, divisible into three sections, can accommodate an intimate wedding for 50 or a large, lush affair for up to 240 guests.

Just off the lobby, The Garden Room, beautifully designed with delicate, artisan crafted dried botanicals and floor to ceiling windows offering expansive views of the Blue Ridge Mountains, is the perfect setting for your Rehearsal Dinner or post Wedding Brunch, accommodating up to 110 seated guests.
header_title: Linger. Relax. Unwind. Refresh. Awaken. Escape.
short_description:
Celebrate in timeless style in any of Keswick Hall’s newly unveiled spaces. Lush outdoor landscaping and valley vistas set a backdrop for unforgettable weddings. A natural amphitheater and outdoor-tented area can host up to 400 guests, while indoors a classic ballroom is wrapped in windows for daylit gatherings or enchanting evening affairs.

  • Floral arrangements
  • Catering by Jean-Georges
  • Custom wedding cakes and desserts
  • Bridal suites
  • Specialty lighting and music
meta_title: Weddings at Keswick Hall | Events in the Blue Ridge Mountains
meta_description: Host your wedding at Keswick Hall in the Blue Ridge Mountains with 4,000 sq. ft. of space and room for up to 500 guests. Contact us today to start planning.
